text: o ma prabhu! Mam'malni niku vidheyuluga (muslinluga) ceyi mariyu ma santati nundi oka sanghanni niku vidheyuluga (muslinluga) undunatlu ceyi. Mariyu maku, ma aradhanaritulanu (manasik lanu) telupu mariyu ma pascattapanni angikarincu. Niscayanga, nive pascattapanni angikarincevadavu, apara karuna pradatavu
